episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of fascinating topics, including the surprising use of sticky rice in the construction of the Great Wall of China, the existence of a massive single-celled organism, the deadly effects of a boomslang snake bite, and the posthumous social media presence of Albert Einstein.

facts.fact: The Great Wall of China is held together by Sticky Rice.
The world's largest single-celled organism can get up to 12 inches long.
If you're bitten by the boomslang snake, you bleed from every orifice.
Albert Einstein has a social media team.
